titleStmt.title: England's champion or, The iust mans fortitude, manifested in that gallant resolution of Sir John Maynard knight of that noble order of the Bath and a (late member of the Honourable house of Commons) &c. Being the copie of his letter and protest, sent unto the Lords Febr. 14. 1647. Directed as followeth. To the Right Honourable my singular good Lord, Edvvard Earle of Manchester, speaker of the House of Peeres. These --
titleStmt.author: Maynard, John, Sir, 1602-1690.

notesStmt.note: Has the same text as Wing (2nd ed.) M1456, but with an additional paragraph of commentary at the end.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
